contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced|date=December 2009}} {{Nihongo|'''Kamogata'''|鴨方町|Kamogata-chō}} was a [[towns of Japan|town]] located in [[Asakuchi District, Okayama|Asakuchi District]], [[Okayama Prefecture|Okayama]], [[Japan]]. On March 21, 2006 Kamogata was merged with the towns of [[Konkō, Okayama|Konkō]] and [[Yorishima, Okayama|Yorishima]], all from [[Asakuchi District, Okayama|Asakuchi District]], to form the new city of [[Asakuchi, Okayama|Asakuchi]]. As of 2003, the town had an estimated [[population]] of 18,446 and a [[population density|density]] of 506.20 persons per km². The total area was 36.44 km². [[Category:Dissolved municipalities of Okayama Prefecture]] {{Okayama-geo-stub}}
